medium: Watercolor, graphite, and touches of brown ink on wove paper
title: A Lioness Preparing to Spring
marks:
Signature, Date and Inscription

bottom left, in LRC, in brown: [Wm. Strutt. / Aug. 8th/89.]
description: low-crouching lioness seen from PL side; studies of hips, face and PL leg of lioness around finished full figure
